name: ethylene glycol
diethylene glycol
4-cyclohexanedimethanol
optionally branched with trimellitic anhydride
FoodContactSubstance: Copolymers of terephthalic acid (CAS Reg. No.100-21-0), ethylene glycol (CAS Reg. No. 107-21-1), diethylene glycol (CAS Reg. No. 111-46-6), and 1,4-cyclohexanedimethanol (CAS Reg. No. 105-08-8),  optionally branched with trimellitic anhydride (CAS Reg. No. 552-30-7).
